name: Gravity Ball - Fantasy Space Jam
description:
Gravity Ball!

In Space!

With Wizards!

Let's Jam!

Requires at least one controller!

Controls:
Left stick to change direction, A to jump to a planet / shoot the boombox in the direction it is rotating in

credits:

Linnea Ronnenberg

Maria Louise Hansen

Mikkel Thygesen

Praveen Namasivayam
